[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex sentence structures impairing smooth flow.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shift from anecdotes to "GETTING A POSITION" section without explicit connection,
[STRUCTURE]: Subtle disconnect between illustrative examples and subsequent generalized advice.
